mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYS_ATTACH_CATEGORY_B T WHERE T.SOURCE_TYPE = #{value} AND T.LEAF_FLAG = 1

select b.category_id, t.category_name, b.leaf_flag, t.description, b.status, b.parent_category_id, b.source_type, b.allowed_file_type, b.allowed_file_size, b.category_path, b.is_unique from SYS_ATTACH_CATEGORY_B B LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_ATTACH_CATEGORY_TL T ON (B.category_id = T.category_id AND t.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) where b.leaf_flag = 1
AND t.category_name like concat('%',concat(#{categoryName},'%'))
AND b.source_type=#{sourceType}
order by b.category_id
SELECT * FROM SYS_ATTACH_CATEGORY_B B LEFT JOIN SYS_ATTACH_CATEGORY_TL T ON (B.category_id = T.category_id AND t.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
